landing.title: Boost your product with digital solutions.
landing.description: Increase your digital presence and optimize your business with websites and web applications, functional and tailored to your needs.

aboutMe.title: Who am I?
aboutMe.description1: Hi! I'm Seba, a software developer, creating digital solutions tailored to the needs of each business. My goal is to help you improve your online presence and attract more clients, ensuring that your business is optimized to grow in the digital world.
aboutMe.description2: With my experience, you will not only enhance the appearance and functionality of your website or web application, but also better organize your business with tools that allow you to manage all your information efficiently and hassle-free.

content.title: Getting to know you
content.description: I listen to your needs—whether it’s an online store, a website, or freelance help. Together, we define the main goal of your project.

content.title: Tailored design
content.description: I create a visual system with the right colors, fonts, and images for your brand. You’ll also get a clickable mockup in Figma to preview the final result.

content.title: Let’s build it
content.description: Once the design is approved, I start developing your site or app. We agree on realistic deadlines and I keep you updated throughout the process.

content.title: Going live
content.description: Your project is launched and everything is set up so you can start using it without any hassle.

content.title: Post-launch support
content.description: After launch, I’m still around to help with any questions, tweaks, or future improvements.

content.title: Online Stores
content.description: I’ll build your online store so you can start selling on the Internet. Simple, functional design tailored to your business. Manage your products, payments, and shipping easily—without relying on anyone.

content.title: Websites
content.description: I’ll design your website so you can showcase what you do or sell in a clear and professional way. Ideal if you offer products, services, or just want a solid online presence—without the hassle.

content.title: Freelance Developer
content.description: If you're a company or team that needs an extra hand, I can jump in as a freelance developer. I work per project, independently, with responsibility and clear communication.

content.title: Personalized Budget
content.description: At CodeVibes, we offer a highly affordable and customized pricing list depending on the complexity of the requirements.

content.title: Guaranteed Satisfaction
content.description: At CodeVibes, your satisfaction is our priority! Pay only if the final product meets your expectations.

content.title: Support
content.description: At CodeVibes, we are always available to optimize your application's performance, ensuring efficient deliveries and tailored solutions.

footer.title: Join the digital revolution to
footer.description: No matter your industry, improving your digital presence is just a click away. I can help you achieve your goals.
footer.slogan: Turn your vision into an exceptional digital experience. Let's connect!
